description: Retrieves the details for a Savings Plan recommendation. These details include the hourly data-points that construct the cost, coverage, and utilization charts.

parameters.name: RecommendationDetailId
parameters.description: The ID that is associated with the Savings Plan recommendation.

nested_items.name: RecommendationDetailId
nested_items.description: The ID that is associated with the Savings Plan recommendation.

nested_items.name: RecommendationDetailData
nested_items.description: Contains detailed information about a specific Savings Plan recommendation.

nested_items.name: AccountScope
nested_items.description: The account scope that you want your recommendations for. Amazon Web Services calculates recommendations including the management account and member accounts if the value is set to PAYER. If the value is LINKED, recommendations are calculated for individual member accounts only.

nested_items.name: LookbackPeriodInDays
nested_items.description: How many days of previous usage that Amazon Web Services considers when making this recommendation.

nested_items.name: SavingsPlansType
nested_items.description: The requested Savings Plan recommendation type.

nested_items.name: TermInYears
nested_items.description: The term of the commitment in years.

nested_items.name: PaymentOption
nested_items.description: The payment option for the commitment (for example, All Upfront or No Upfront).

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The AccountID that the recommendation is generated for.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency code that Amazon Web Services used to generate the recommendation and present potential savings.

nested_items.name: InstanceFamily
nested_items.description: The instance family of the recommended Savings Plan.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The region the recommendation is generated for.

nested_items.name: OfferingId
nested_items.description: The unique ID that's used to distinguish Savings Plans from one another.

nested_items.name: GenerationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The period of time that you want the usage and costs for.

nested_items.name: LatestUsageTimestamp
nested_items.description: The period of time that you want the usage and costs for.

nested_items.name: CurrentAverageHourlyOnDemandSpend
nested_items.description: The average value of hourly On-Demand spend over the lookback period of the applicable usage type.

nested_items.name: CurrentMaximumHourlyOnDemandSpend
nested_items.description: The highest value of hourly On-Demand spend over the lookback period of the applicable usage type.

nested_items.name: CurrentMinimumHourlyOnDemandSpend
nested_items.description: The lowest value of hourly On-Demand spend over the lookback period of the applicable usage type.

nested_items.name: EstimatedAverageUtilization
nested_items.description: The estimated utilization of the recommended Savings Plan.

nested_items.name: EstimatedMonthlySavingsAmount
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly savings amount based on the recommended Savings Plan.

nested_items.name: EstimatedOnDemandCost
nested_items.description: The remaining On-Demand cost estimated to not be covered by the recommended Savings Plan, over the length of the lookback period.

nested_items.name: EstimatedOnDemandCostWithCurrentCommitment
nested_items.description: The estimated On-Demand costs you expect with no additional commitment, based on your usage of the selected time period and the Savings Plan you own.

nested_items.name: EstimatedROI
nested_items.description: The estimated return on investment that's based on the recommended Savings Plan that you purchased. This is calculated as estimatedSavingsAmount/estimatedSPCost*100.

nested_items.name: EstimatedSPCost
nested_items.description: The cost of the recommended Savings Plan over the length of the lookback period.

nested_items.name: EstimatedSavingsAmount
nested_items.description: The estimated savings amount that's based on the recommended Savings Plan over the length of the lookback period.

nested_items.name: EstimatedSavingsPercentage
nested_items.description: The estimated savings percentage relative to the total cost of applicable On-Demand usage over the lookback period.

nested_items.name: ExistingHourlyCommitment
nested_items.description: The existing hourly commitment for the Savings Plan type.

nested_items.name: HourlyCommitmentToPurchase
nested_items.description: The recommended hourly commitment level for the Savings Plan type and the configuration that's based on the usage during the lookback period.

nested_items.name: UpfrontCost
nested_items.description: The upfront cost of the recommended Savings Plan, based on the selected payment option.

nested_items.name: CurrentAverageCoverage
nested_items.description: The average value of hourly coverage over the lookback period.

nested_items.name: EstimatedAverageCoverage
nested_items.description: The estimated coverage of the recommended Savings Plan.

nested_items.name: MetricsOverLookbackPeriod
nested_items.description: The related hourly cost, coverage, and utilization metrics over the lookback period.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The period of time that you want the usage and costs for.

nested_items.name: EstimatedOnDemandCost
nested_items.description: The remaining On-Demand cost estimated to not be covered by the recommended Savings Plan, over the length of the lookback period.

nested_items.name: CurrentCoverage
nested_items.description: The current amount of Savings Plans eligible usage that the Savings Plan covered.

nested_items.name: EstimatedCoverage
nested_items.description: The estimated coverage amount based on the recommended Savings Plan.

nested_items.name: EstimatedNewCommitmentUtilization
nested_items.description: The estimated utilization for the recommended Savings Plan.
